verses.verse: וַיְהִי֩ <WH1961> become בִשְׁנַ֨ת <WH8141> year הַתְּשִׁיעִ֜ית <WH8671> And it came to pass in the ninth לְמָלְכ֗וֹ <WH4427> of his reign בַּחֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH2320> month הָעֲשִׂירִי֮ <WH6224> in the tenth בֶּעָשׂ֣וֹר <WH6218> in the tenth לַחֹדֶשׁ֒ <WH2320> [day] of the month בָּ֠א <WH935> came נְבֻכַדְנֶאצַּ֨ר <WH5019> [that] Nebuchadnezzar מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king בָּבֶ֜ל <WH894> of Babylon ה֧וּא <WH1931> he וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all חֵיל֛וֹ <WH2428> he and all his host עַל־ <WH5921> against יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <WH3389> against Jerusalem וַיִּ֣חַן <WH2583> and pitched עָלֶ֑יהָ <WH5921> against וַיִּבְנ֥וּ <WH1129> against it and they built עָלֶ֖יהָ <WH5921> against דָּיֵ֥ק <WH1785> forts סָבִֽיב׃ <WH5439> against it round about

וַתָּבֹ֥א <WH935> abide הָעִ֖יר <WH5892> And the city בַּמָּצ֑וֹר <WH4692> siege עַ֚ד <WH5704> until עַשְׁתֵּ֣י <WH6249> eleven עֶשְׂרֵ֣ה <WH6240> ten שָׁנָ֔ה <WH8141> year לַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> of king צִדְקִיָּֽהוּ׃ <WH6667> Zedekiah

בְּתִשְׁעָ֣ה <WH8672> And on the ninth לַחֹ֔דֶשׁ <WH2320> [day] of the [fourth] month וַיֶּחֱזַ֥ק <WH2388> prevailed הָרָעָ֖ב <WH7458> the famine בָּעִ֑יר <WH5892> in the city וְלֹא־ <WH3808> no הָ֥יָה <WH1961> become לֶ֖חֶם <WH3899> and there was no bread לְעַ֥ם <WH5971> for the people הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> of the land

וַתִּבָּקַ֣ע <WH1234> was broken up הָעִ֗יר <WH5892> And the city וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all אַנְשֵׁ֨י <WH376> the men הַמִּלְחָמָ֤ה ׀ <WH4421> of war הַלַּ֙יְלָה֙ <WH3915> [fled] by night דֶּ֜רֶךְ <WH1870> by the way שַׁ֣עַר ׀ <WH8179> of the gate בֵּ֣ין <WH996> between הַחֹמֹתַ֗יִם <WH2346> between two walls אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> after עַל־ <WH5921> beside גַּ֣ן <WH1588> garden הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> which [is] by the king's וְכַשְׂדִּ֥ים <WH3778> (now the Chaldees עַל־ <WH5921> beside הָעִ֖יר <WH5892> [were] against the city סָבִ֑יב <WH5439> were all וַיֵּ֖לֶךְ <WH1980> went דֶּ֥רֶךְ <WH1870> the way הָעֲרָבָֽה׃ <WH6160> toward the plain

וַיִּרְדְּפ֤וּ <WH7291> pursued חֵיל־ <WH2428> And the army כַּשְׂדִּים֙ <WH3778> of the Chaldees אַחַ֣ר <WH310> after הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> the king וַיַּשִּׂ֥גוּ <WH5381> and overtook אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> בְּעַרְב֣וֹת <WH6160> him in the plains יְרֵח֑וֹ <WH3405> of Jericho וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all חֵיל֔וֹ <WH2428> and all his army נָפֹ֖צוּ <WH6327> were scattered מֵעָלָֽיו׃ <WH5921> and

וַֽיִּתְפְּשׂוּ֙ <WH8610> So they took אֶת־ <WH853> הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> the king וַיַּעֲל֥וּ <WH5927> and brought him up אֹת֛וֹ <WH853> אֶל־ <WH413> to מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> to the king בָּבֶ֖ל <WH894> of Babylon רִבְלָ֑תָה <WH7247> to Riblah וַיְדַבְּר֥וּ <WH1696> and they gave אִתּ֖וֹ <WH854> for מִשְׁפָּֽט׃ <WH4941> judgment

וְאֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֵי֙ <WH1121> the sons צִדְקִיָּ֔הוּ <WH6667> of Zedekiah שָׁחֲט֖וּ <WH7819> And they slew לְעֵינָ֑יו <WH5869> before his eyes וְאֶת־ <WH853> עֵינֵ֤י <WH5869> the eyes צִדְקִיָּ֙הוּ֙ <WH6667> of Zedekiah עִוֵּ֔ר <WH5786> and put out וַיַּאַסְרֵ֙הוּ֙ <WH631> and bound בַֽנְחֻשְׁתַּ֔יִם <WH5178> him with fetters וַיְבִאֵ֖הוּ <WH935> and carried בָּבֶֽל׃ <WH894> him to Babylon ס

וּבַחֹ֤דֶשׁ <WH2320> month הַֽחֲמִישִׁי֙ <WH2549> And in the fifth בְּשִׁבְעָ֣ה <WH7651> on the seventh לַחֹ֔דֶשׁ <WH2320> [day] of the month הִ֗יא <WH1931> which שְׁנַת֙ <WH8141> year תְּשַֽׁע־ <WH8672> nine עֶשְׂרֵ֣ה <WH6240> teen שָׁנָ֔ה <WH8141> year לַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> of king נְבֻכַדְנֶאצַּ֣ר <WH5019> Nebuchadnezzar מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king בָּבֶ֑ל <WH894> of Babylon בָּ֞א <WH935> came נְבוּזַרְאֲדָ֧ן <WH5018> Nebuzaradan רַב־ <WH7227> captain טַבָּחִ֛ים <WH2876> of the guard עֶ֥בֶד <WH5650> a servant מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> of the king בָּבֶ֖ל <WH894> of Babylon יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> unto Jerusalem

וַיִּשְׂרֹ֥ף <WH8313> And he burnt אֶת־ <WH853> בֵּית־ <WH1004> the house יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD וְאֶת־ <WH853> בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> house הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> and the king's וְאֵ֨ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all בָּתֵּ֧י <WH1004> and all the houses יְרוּשָׁלִַ֛ם <WH3389> of Jerusalem וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> every בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> [man's] house גָּד֖וֹל <WH1419> and every great שָׂרַ֥ף <WH8313> burnt בָּאֵֽשׁ׃ <WH784> he with fire

וְאֶת־ <WH853> חוֹמֹ֥ת <WH2346> the walls יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <WH3389> of Jerusalem סָבִ֑יב <WH5439> round about נָֽתְצוּ֙ <WH5422> brake down כָּל־ <WH3605> all חֵ֣יל <WH2428> And all the army כַּשְׂדִּ֔ים <WH3778> of the Chaldees אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> who רַב־ <WH7227> that [were with] the captain טַבָּחִֽים׃ <WH2876> of the guard

וְאֵת֩ <WH853> יֶ֨תֶר <WH3499> Now the rest הָעָ֜ם <WH5971> of the people הַנִּשְׁאָרִ֣ים <WH7604> [that were] left בָּעִ֗יר <WH5892> in the city וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַנֹּֽפְלִים֙ <WH5307> and the fugitives אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> who נָפְלוּ֙ <WH5307> that fell away עַל־ <WH5921> unto הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> to the king בָּבֶ֔ל <WH894> of Babylon וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> יֶ֣תֶר <WH3499> with the remnant הֶהָמ֑וֹן <WH1995> of the multitude הֶגְלָ֕ה <WH1540> carry away נְבוּזַרְאֲדָ֖ן <WH5018> did Nebuzaradan רַב־ <WH7227> the captain טַבָּחִֽים׃ <WH2876> of the guard

וּמִדַּלַּ֣ת <WH1803> of the poor הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> of the land הִשְׁאִ֖יר <WH7604> left רַב־ <WH7227> But the captain טַבָּחִ֑ים <WH2876> of the guard לְכֹֽרְמִ֖ים <WH3755> [to be] vinedressers וּלְיֹגְבִֽים׃ <WH1461> husbandman
